subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets now have about $160 million in new money to spend, thanks to their majority ownership of the SNY regional sports network, which the team has been able to borrow against.
snippet: The Mets now have about $160 million in new money to spend, thanks to their majority ownership of the SNY regional sports network, which the team has been able to borrow against.
